Daisuke suffers in front of his strong enemy, Sakon. Will he be able to master the deadly sword Konoha Gaeshi and defeat the great evil? This eye-catching masked hero period drama, which is still popular among a wide range of generations and features brilliant storytelling by the great master Mitsuteru Yokoyama, is being reprinted for the first time in half a century. f0c6398a-98d9-49c6-aa56-9325b2cd8e02:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"f0c6398a-98d9-49c6-aa56-9325b2cd8e02","title":{"en":"Operation of Great Mysteries [Kuwata Version] + School Master"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"怪奇大作戦【桑田版】+学園名主"},{"ja-ro":"Kaiki Daisakensen (Kuwata-ban) + Gakuen Nanushi"}],"relatedIds":["1406ef81-67cd-4171-b832-ffce0a358ece","3440cea7-d8bc-49df-ba2f-98c602368138"],"description":{"en":"Jiro Kuwata has made a comic version of \"Operation of Great Mysteries ,'' which was aired on TV by Tsuburaya Productions. The members of SRI use the power of science to solve the strange phenomena that are moving in the darkness of modern times. A blood-curdling mystery awaits them...\n\n\"Operation of Great Mysteries'', which aired in 1968, is a masterpiece drama in which Tsuburaya Productions, who suddenly became famous with the Ultra series, departed from the monster route and took on the challenge of creating a SF horror series that made full use of tokusatsu.\n\nMany manga artists took on the challenge of adapting it into a manga but among them, Jiro Kuwata's version, which was serialized in Shueisha's Shonen Book, was a work that depicts the scientific tricks hidden behind the horror of the original work. Its sharp and linear touch was highly praised.\n\nThe horror of a man-eating moth that melts humans and turns them into bones, a mysterious beautiful girl who escapes from paintings and shoots people, and what happens when her beloved becomes a vampire. What will Roelin do?\n\n---\nOne day, a near-death experience causes Loelline Deaz to remember her past life, awakening the power to see the future through her dreams. However, there is one vision in particular that weighs on her the most— she foresees the murder of the empire's hero, Duke Dante van Benerit! Loelline is the only one who can save the duke, but as she gets closer to uncovering the conspiracy behind his demise, she realizes that her past may have more to do with the grim future than she could've ever dreamed...\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A1%9C%EC%97%98%EB%A6%B0%EC%9D%80-%EB%AF%B8%EB%9E%98%EB%A5%BC-%EA%B1%B7%EB%8A%94%EB%8B%A4/2522), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59153029)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/loelline-seizes-the-future/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/97944)"},"links":{"al":"141119","ap":"roelin-walks-the-future","engtl":"https://tapas.io/series/loelline-seizes-the-future/info","mu":"188320","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/content/59153029"},"originalLanguage":"ko","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"292e862b-2d17-4062-90a2-0356caa4ae27","name":{"en":"Time Travel"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

When she woke up from her dream, she was determined to reshape her future, realizing that she had plenty of time before the crucial turning point. The story deals with the development of computers (artificial intelligence) called Multivacs and their relationships with humanity through the courses of seven historic settings, beginning in 2061.  \n  \nA personal favourite of the master Sci-Fi writer Isaac Asimov, it is a thought-provoking fiction that even most non Sci-Fi buffs can enjoy. f23468a0-78b0-403b-aa8b-0a95db55762b:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"f23468a0-78b0-403b-aa8b-0a95db55762b","title":{"en":"Junai Junkie"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Di Gelanggang Impi"},{"en":"Dojiko \u0026 Hero"},{"en":"Fool For You (SHIUMI Saki)"},{"en":"Pure Love Junkie"},{"en":"The Hallway Rumors"},{"en":"純愛ジャンキー"},{"en":"纯爱中毒"}],"description":{"en":"A series of short stories.  \n  \n-Dojiko \u0026 Hero:  \nMana is a manager of the boys' basketball club of Saijo High School. She repeats blunders, but always tries as hard as she can! She is a first-year student, and in one-sided love with Haruka, an ace player. Haruka is so cool that he is likely to be isolated in the club. Mana wants to help him, but…!?  \n  \n-Fool For You  \nNanase's childhood friend, Youta, is four years older. He left 3 years ago for university and has recently returned for only a week.
